alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Holmes; North Walton; South Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 04 at 2:51AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Walton and western Holmes Counties through 215 AM CST... At 151 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southeast of Laurel Hill to 10 miles northwest of Eglin Air Force Base to near Eglin AFB. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Union, Liberty, Pond Creek, Oakwood Hills, Cluster Springs, Gaskin, Alpine Heights, Darlington, Arrant Settlement, De Funiak Spring Airport, Glendale, Pleasant Ridge, Center Ridge, New Harmony, Piney Grove, Argyle, Mossy Head and Caney Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Holmes; North Walton; South Walton
